member.name: M:_15_Methods.Program.ReverseArray(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Takes in an array and reverses it.
member.returns: An array of the original array passed that is reversed.

member.name: M:_15_Methods.Program.PrintFibSequence(System.Int32)
member.summary: creates a fib sequence that is as long as the passed in size value
member.param: How long you want the fib sequence array to be.
member.returns: The fibSequence based on the requested size
